title: pula paanpu
sahitya:
pUla pAnpu mIda bAga pUrNa pavvaLincu

anupallavi

 nIla ghana shyAma harE nirupama rAmayya malle

caraNam 1

 madhusharkara vennapAlu mari yArginci vidhumukha kammani viDamu vEsi nanu kaTAkSinci
   
caraNam 2

 parimaLa gandhambu mEna bAguganu bUsi merayaga suma hAramulanu mEda nindanu vEsi
   
caraNam 3

 AgamOktammayina shayya nangIkarinci tyAgarAja krtamulella tathyamani santOSinci
